thread.title: Macron's tighter asylum rules worry own party

title: Macron's tighter asylum rules worry own party
text:
Macron's tighter asylum rules worry own party 12:09am IST - 01:47 
French President Emmanuel Macron has proposed tougher immigration and asylum laws despite strident criticism from rights groups. That has tested his so-far united parliamentary majority. Reuters Julie Carriat reports.   
French President Emmanuel Macron has proposed tougher immigration and asylum laws despite strident criticism from rights groups. That has tested his so-far united parliamentary majority. Reuters Julie Carriat reports.  //in.reuters.com/video/2018/02/21/macrons-tighter-asylum-rules-worry-own-p?videoId=403142514&videoChannel=13423
